title: Email Troble
body: i need to chang my password some one is using my account and i cant remember what email i used and i cant chang my email  they seed the code to my old email yes i know this sounds sketchy but it is really the owner of the account i let my brother us it it was fine for a little then he started to spend my rp and ip that is where her crossed the line plz help  my user name

replies.body: When you need to recover an account like this, make sure that you [submit a ticket ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AnEEJKrv-alert-ping-issue)as quickly as possible!  Our Account Recovery Specialists can investigate the issue for you and get it back to you ASAP.
